          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy from the Sun causes wind, waves and rain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie von der Sonne verursacht Wind, Wellen und 
Regen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'énergie du soleil cause le vent, les vagues et 
la pluie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A energia do sol causa o vento, as ondas e a 
chuva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'energia proveniente dal sole causa il vento, le 
onde e la pioggia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια από τον αέρα, τα κύματα και τη βροχή αιτιών
ήλιων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La energía del sol causa el viento, ondas y la 
lluvia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that energy from the Sun causes wind, waves and rain.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Energie von der Sonne 
Wind, Wellen und Regen verursacht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'énergie du soleil
cause le vent, les vagues et la pluie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a energia do sol 
causa o vento, as ondas e a chuva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'energia 
proveniente dal sole causa il vento, le onde e la pioggia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η ενέργεια από τον 
ήλιο προκαλεί τον αέρα, τα κύματα και τη βροχή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la energía del sol 
causa el viento, ondas y la lluvia.</string>
          </description>
